name: FlexWash
headline: The operating system for the car wash industry.
description: Car washing is a $15B market in dire need of disruption. Legacy systems are costly, out of date, and inflexible. We are building modern solutions to help car wash operators manage and grow their business.

founders.name: Karan Toor, Founder
founders.description: Been writing B2B SaaS software for over a decade, noticed car wash software was especially behind. Interested in math puzzles and economics.

founders.name: Chirag Toor, Founder
founders.description: I'm a co-founder of FlexWash. I've been writing software for over 10 years and running my family car wash with my brother for 4 years. We ran into several pain points trying to run our car wash with existing solutions, so we built our own.

generated_description:
FlexWash is a burgeoning startup that’s taken a hard look at the car wash industry, a $15 billion market that’s ripe for innovation. Founded in 2021 and currently part of Y Combinator’s W23 batch, this company is based in Temecula, California. FlexWash aims to modernize a sector that has long relied on outdated and rigid legacy systems that lean heavily on manual processes and limited flexibility.

The mission? To create "the operating system for the car wash industry." This isn’t just a catchy tagline—FlexWash is building tools that empower car wash operators to efficiently manage and grow their businesses. With a small but dedicated team of two, they’re focused on delivering cutting-edge software solutions that include a point-of-sale (POS) system, customer relationship management (CRM) tools, and advanced marketing features. 

So, what’s under the hood? FlexWash’s platform includes several standout features:
- **Chick-fil-A Inspired Approach**: A service model aimed at elevating customer experience.
- **License Plate Recognition (LPR)**: Utilizes AI technology to streamline operations by tracking and reading vehicle plates.
- **Comprehensive Reporting**: Offers insights into car wash reporting that help operators understand their performance metrics.
- **Built-in CRM**: Designed to track every customer interaction and boost upselling opportunities by using customer wash histories.

Customer feedback underscores FlexWash’s effectiveness. For example, clients like Glide XPRESS have seen a dramatic increase in memberships by leveraging the built-in CRM to optimize their sales processes, leading to record conversions in just a month.

Ultimately, FlexWash is not just another SaaS solution; it’s a thoughtful, integrated approach to reshaping how car wash businesses operate—making them more efficient, customer-friendly, and adaptable in a fast-changing market. With strong backing and innovative offerings, they’re carving out a promising niche in a sector that’s crying out for disruption.

For more information, check out their website at [FlexWash](https://www.flexwashtech.com/).
